job.title: Software Engineer - New Grad
job.description: At Databricks we are passionate about helping data teams solve the worlds toughest problems  from making the next mode of transportation a reality to accelerating the development of medical breakthroughs We do this by building and running the worlds best data and AI infrastructure platform so our customers can use deep data insights to improve their business Founded by engineers  and customer obsessed  we leap at every opportunity to solve technical challenges from designing nextgen UIUX for working with data to scaling our services and infrastructure across millions of virtual machinesltbrgtltbrgtAs a software engineer you will work with our engineering team to build infrastructure and products for the Databricks platform We are hiring across all of our teams including platform infrastructure databases and customerfacing products You will join a cohort of engineers who will build their careers through collaborative projects and learning opportunities With a dedicated mentor and supportive team youll onboard quickly and start contributing to impactful projects soon after starting here at Databricksltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt The Impact You Will Have ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtWork with a team to deliver features and improve architectureltligtltligtDevelop and extend the Databricks productltligtltligtOwn full software development lifecycle design development testing and operating in productionltligtltligtBuild solutions with a high level of reliability scalability and securityltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt What We Look For ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtYou will graduate in Fall 2021 or Spring 2022 with a degree in Computer Science Engineering or related subjectltligtltligtYou have implementation skills in one or more programming languages including Java Python or CltligtltligtYou have a good knowledge of algorithms data structures systems and OOP principlesltligtltligtYou have experience managing endtoend projectsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt Benefits ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtComprehensive health coverage including medical dental and visionltligtltligt401k PlanltligtltligtEquity awardsltligtltligtFlexible time offltligtltligtPaid parental leaveltligtltligtFamily PlanningltligtltligtGym reimbursementltligtltligtAnnual personal development fundltligtltligtWork headphones reimbursementltligtltligtEmployee Assistance Program EAPltligtltligtBusiness travel accident insuranceltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt About Databricks ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDatabricks is the data and AI company More than 5000 organizations worldwide  including Comcast Cond Nast HampampM and over 40 of the Fortune 500 rely on Databricks Lakehouse platform to unify their data analytics and AI Databricks is headquartered in San Francisco with offices around the globe Founded by the original creators of Apache Spark Delta Lake and MLflow Databricks is on a mission to help data teams solve the worlds toughest problems To learn more follow Databricks on Twitter LinkedIn and FacebookltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Commitment to Diversity and InclusionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAt Databricks we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive culture where everyone can excel We take great care to ensure that our hiring practices are inclusive and meet equal employment opportunity standards Individuals looking for employment at Databricks are considered without regard to age color disability ethnicity family or marital status gender identity or expression language national origin physical and mental ability political affiliation race religion sexual orientation socioeconomic status veteran status and other protected characteristics
